plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear a green coat all year. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow tall in forests and parks.
🍃 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🪵 Birds build their homes in me.

plant.question: I am yellow and grow in a field. Farmers harvest me to make yummy things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am often ground into flour.
🍿 You can pop me for a tasty snack.
🚜 I grow in rows on a farm.

plant.question: I am a color and a flower. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I often grow in gardens.
🎨 My name is a shade of purple.
🐝 Butterflies are often found on me.

plant.question: I have many layers, and I make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I'm often used in cooking.
🔪 My smell is very strong.
😭 I am a bulb, not a fruit.

plant.question: I am a fruit with seeds on the outside. I am often red and juicy.

hints.text: 🍓 I am often used in jams and desserts.
🌱 I am not a berry even though I am called one.
🍰 I'm delicious with cream.

plant.question: I am a plant that can sting you if you touch me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I have jagged leaves.
🔥 My sting causes itching.
🌿 I often grow in shady areas.

plant.question: I’m a tall, strong plant that lives for many years and provides oxygen. I need water, sun, and space to live. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁I have a trunk and branches that reach for the sky.
🐦️Animals use me for food and shelter.
🌎 I am vital for the environment.

plant.question: I am a plant that follows the sun across the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I have a large, yellow head.
☀️ I am often grown for my seeds.
🚜 Farmers grow me a lot

plant.question: I am a juicy fruit, but I am also a plant with spiky leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 I grow in tropical climates.
🍕 I am sometimes put on pizza (controversially).
🍹 I taste good in juice.

plant.question: I am a plant that eats insects. I have a sticky trap to catch my prey. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I often grow in bogs and wetlands.
🍃 My traps can be pitcher-shaped or snap shut.
🦟 I get nutrients from bugs.

food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to peel me before they eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Some animals enjoy me as a treat
☀️ I am the color of sunshine
📏 I grow in bunches

food.question: I am round and juicy, and I come in many colors like red, green, and yellow. An old saying tells you to eat me every day to keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 People use me in pies
🌳 I grow on trees
🩺 I'm good for your health!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or pour me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Baby cows drink me
🥣 I am often served cold.
🐄 I come from an animal

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes some people cry when they chop me. I have layers and a strong smell. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am round like a ball
🧄 I'm related to garlic.
😭 I can make you teary-eyed

food.question: I am a popular party food. I am usually round and covered in sauce and cheese. You can add many toppings to me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often cut into triangles
🇮🇹 I am an Italian food
🚚 You can order me for delivery

food.question: I am a sweet treat that is often swirled. I come in many flavors and colors, and you eat me with a cone or in a cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am very cold
☀️ I'm perfect for hot days!
🍨 I melt easily

food.question: I am made from grains, and I am often eaten in slices. You can put butter and jam on me, or make a sandwich with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can be toasted
🌾 I'm made in a bakery
🥪 I am often used to make sandwiches

food.question: I am a small, green vegetable that grows in a pod. Many children don't like to eat me, but I am good for you! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am often found next to carrots on a plate
🍲 I am a popular ingredient in soups.
🟢 I am green like grass

food.question: I am a savory dish made with rice, vegetables, and often meat or seafood. I am a popular dish in many Asian countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🥢 I'm often eaten with chopsticks.
🍚 The base of me is white.
🌏 I come in many forms

food.question: I am a stone fruit with fuzzy skin. My insides are yellow or white, and I have a large pit in the center. What am I?

hints.text: 🍑 I am related to plums.
☀️ I grow best in warm weather
🧺 Some people make cobblers out of me
